Name: cough variant asthma
Definition: An asthma that is characterized by chronic nonproductive cough without shortness of breath.

Name: obsolete transsexuality with homosexual history
Definition: An asthma that is characterized by chronic nonproductive cough without shortness of breath.

Name: intrinsic asthma
Definition: An asthma that is triggered by factors not related to allergies such as anxiety

Name: status asthmaticus
Definition: An asthma that is a life threatening condition with progressive respiratory failure

Name: allergic asthma
Definition: An asthma that is characterized by symptoms that are triggered by an allergic reaction caused by inhaled allergens such as dust mite allergen
